name: beta-dse
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Datastax Enterprise is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.datastax.com and https://gist.github.com/sascala/723e2c0451b43e3ec897d8c2098889e9
	Issues: https://www.datastax.com/contactus
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS Datastax Enterprise has been uninstalled.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in beta.  You must perform an advanced install and check the opt-in option.  Contact Mesosphere before deploying this beta candidate data service framework.  There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
